messages.title: Even people who disagree with Kate say she is a fearless, honest campaigner who fights for her constituents.
These are not our values here in Vauxhall.
messages.content: The Lib Dems prop up Tory Governments.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Has a spotless expenses record and helps bring down the Commons Speaker who tried to cover for expenses cheating, always clearly sets out her beliefs and pledges to elections and follows them through.
Opposed the Iraq War, ID Cards and tuition fees; backed support for child refugees, rights at work and same-sex marriage.
Exposed Garden Bridge costs & sweetheart deals despite establishment approval; helped uncover wrongdoing at Kids' Company charity.
Has helped tens of thousands of constituents with vast problems, from housing and benefits, to immigration and schooling.
Speaks out for those who are suffering under this government- the underpaid, the disabled, pensioners in poverty and the homeless. Opposing sell-offs of local community centres.

housing.content: Has helped tens of thousands of constituents with vast problems, including housing.

contactInformation.address: Office 2 Rear, Houghton Square, London, SW9 9AN.

images.caption: Image of Kate Hoey with supporters holding 'Vote Labour' placards.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet criticises the Liberal Democrats for breaking promises and siding with the Conservative agenda on issues such as tripling tuition fees, reorganisation of the NHS, supporting George Osborne's budgets, voting for bedroom tax and supporting large cuts to police.
